meta.title: Gatsby enhanced
meta.description: Save yourself the time and trouble of configuring per trial and error and set up Gatsby with Typescript. A quick guide to an improved Gatsby configuration.

node.excerpt: I recently  decided to start a blog  which raised the question what platform to use for this venture. And what kind of developer would I be if I didn't see this as a golden…

although I'm quite embarassed to not think that way about it earlier. I had been playing around with…
